## Slot.inputText property

Human readable description of what kind of information the slot is expecting. The text should be very brief. For example:

"zip" "zip code" "city" "state" "street"

 {<!-- -->string<!-- -->}  Slot

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
inputText?: string;
```
